results.title: Effects of metformin on proliferation and apoptosis of human megakaryoblastic Dami and MEG-01 cells.
results.text_hl: These findings support the possibility of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment as a new therapeutic strategy against @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Megakaryoblastic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007947 @@@acute megakaryoblastic leukemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Megakaryoblastic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007947 @@@AMKL@@@).
